byline: Candace Manriquez, David Lazarus, Kaitlin Funaro and Mitchell Hartman
description: This weekend on Marketplace Money, guest host David Lazarus from the LA Times talks to relationship expert Andrea Syrtash about the tough money conversations couples need to have before walking down the aisle. Fox Business contributor Andrea Murad chats about how young people can make themselves indispensable at their first job. Then, Marketplace’s Mitchell Hartman stops by to talk about how job-seeking workers can discreetly shop themselves around for new gigs while staying employed at the same time. Josh Levin, executive editor of Slate, gives tips for winning your World Cup office pool. And Ben Johnson, host of Marketplace Tech, about the future of video games at the E3 Conference.
